name: @darlean/examples
description: Examples of using Darlean Virtual Actor Technology

scripts.test: npm run example:oracle:all && npm run example:performance:all
scripts.example:oracle:all: npm run example:oracle:1:allinone && npm run example:oracle:2:allinone && npm run example:oracle:2:clientserver && npm run example:oracle:2:clientserver:reuse && npm run example:oracle:2:clientserver2 && npm run example:oracle:2:clientserver2:reuse
scripts.example:oracle:2:clientserver: npx rimraf ./persistence && concurrently --success first --kill-others "npm run example:oracle:2:server server server" "npm run example:oracle:2:client client server"
scripts.example:oracle:2:clientserver:reuse: concurrently --success first --kill-others "npm run example:oracle:2:server server server" "npm run example:oracle:2:client client server reuse"
scripts.example:oracle:2:clientserver2: npx rimraf ./persistence && concurrently --success first --kill-others "npm run example:oracle:2:server server01 server01,server02" "npm run example:oracle:2:server server02 server01,server02" "npm run example:oracle:2:client client server01,server02"
scripts.example:oracle:2:clientserver2:reuse: concurrently --success first --kill-others "npm run example:oracle:2:server server01 server01,server02" "npm run example:oracle:2:server server02 server01,server02" "npm run example:oracle:2:client client server01,server02 reuse"
scripts.example:performance:all: npm run example:performance:n1 && npm run example:performance:n3
scripts.example:performance:n3: concurrently --success first --kill-others "node lib/performance/server.js server00 server00,server01,server02" "node lib/performance/server.js server01 server00,server01,server02" "node lib/performance/server.js server02 server00,server01,server02" "node lib/performance/client.js client server00,server01,server02"
scripts.example:performance:n1: concurrently --success first --kill-others "node lib/performance/server.js server00 server00" "node lib/performance/client.js client server00"
scripts.preversion: npm run format && npm install && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.precommit: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.doc: npx typedoc --skipErrorChecking --json typedoc-out.json &  npx docgen typedoc-out.json ./docs/

author: Theo van der Donk
